title: Burgues Script Font
content:

comments.content:
Ha ha ha, that's so funny. You are most definitely in the wrong place. Tell your customer to PAY!!!!!

Nick Cooke
You can buy the font at veer.com, the download is free.

I’m sure you can find a reasonable substitute [over here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017144555/http:/www.somethingawful.com/fakesa/fontsite/).

Btw, the [Afternoon Delight font](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017144555/http:/www.fontasticcalligraphy.com/?q=node/47) you are showing on your website is actually a cheap rip-off of [Hermann Zapf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017144555/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hermann%20Zapf)’s [Zapfino](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017144555/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Zapfino). I suspect the same goes for some of the [other fonts you are using](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017144555/http:/www.fontasticcalligraphy.com/?q=image/tid/2). E.g., [Carlotta](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017144555/http:/www.fontasticcalligraphy.com/?q=node/40) is [Carpenter](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017144555/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dsgnhaus/carpenter/familytree.html).

Made a perfect first impression.

Whoa...$1 per envelope to print an address?
